front.title: IEEE Standard for Current Transformers with Maximum Milliampere Secondary Current of 250 mA
front.abstract: Milliampere-range current transformers (CTs) are not addressed in the scope of IEEE Std C57.13-2016. The evaluation, certification, and specification of milliampere CTs is enabled in this standard similar to the present process available for 5-A secondary output CTs.
